definition: a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
to mark time and make no advances (idiom)

sentences.english: Sales of a variety of consumer-related products are gaining steadily.
sentences.chinese: 各種消費食品的銷售在穩步上升。

sentences.english: Prior to 2001, the Northern Areas were attracting a steadily growing stream of Western visitors.
sentences.chinese: 2001年以前北方地區吸引的西方遊客穩步增長。

sentences.english: Steady rollin woman gonna come my way.
sentences.chinese: 穩步輥女子前來自首途中。

sentences.english: Steading the developing performance for a new founded metal trading company.
sentences.chinese: 使一個剛成立的金屬貿易公司的績效穩步發展。

sentences.english: Therefore, we must take effective measures to ensure the steady growth of the debenture industry of the enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須採取有效措施促進企業債券穩步發展。

sentences.english: China is now steadily developing its economy and there is great potential in bilateral cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 中國經濟正在穩步發展，我們雙方開展合作大有潛力。

sentences.english: Community construction is progressing at a steady pace and community services are rendered in various forms.
sentences.chinese: 航頭社區建設穩步推進，社區服務開展得有聲有色。

sentences.english: The original fortress expanded steadily until it started to host governmental affairs.
sentences.chinese: 最初的堡壘穩步擴張，直到它開始主掌政府事務處理。

sentences.english: China´s external trade is steadily becoming more balanced.
sentences.chinese: 中國的對外貿易穩步發展，日益均衡。

sentences.english: As prices is steady raising, we’d advise you to place your order without delay.
sentences.chinese: 因爲價格正在穩步上升，我方建議你方早日下訂單。

sentences.english: Over the 10 years since the establishment of diplomatic ties, the bilateral relations have been developing steadily.
sentences.chinese: 建交10年來，兩國關係穩步發展。

sentences.english: Hu Jintao said that since the establishment of diplomatic ties, relations between the two countries have been developing steadily.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤說，中葡建交以來，兩國關係穩步發展。

sentences.english: Third, we will steadily carry out upgrading of processing trade.
sentences.chinese: 三是穩步推進加工貿易轉型升級。

sentences.english: Work-related accidents steadily increased from 1990 to 2002.
sentences.chinese: 自1990年開始，工傷事故數目每年穩步增長。

sentences.english: The broader stock market has chugged steadily higher since March.
sentences.chinese: 自3月份以來，股市整體穩步回升。

sentences.english: Elley made steadily but slowly towards them.
sentences.chinese: 埃利穩步而緩慢地向他們走去。
